ace_sentences: The graph shows percentages of people who believe that the world is getting better with each generation.
The graph compares younger generations and older generations.
Most younger generations believe that the world is getting better.
Most older generations do not believe that the world is getting better.
The graph shows percentages for each country.
The graph separates people into the age group 15-24 and the age group 40+.
In only 3 countries, older generations believe that the world is improving.
In the other countries, older generations do not believe that the world is improving.
The percentages show that almost no older people have faith in the future of the world.
